participant_1.name: Harold
participant_1.personality: Caring and enthusiastic, with a love for music and a strong bond with pets.
participant_1.background: I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them. I enjoy sharing my love of music and unicorns with others. I work at a non profit that helps children. I enjoy a coke with my burger.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Optimistic yet self-critical, dedicated to family and passionate about cooking.
participant_2.background: I love to spend time with my kids and show them my collection. I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best. I don’t believe in love. She taught me to cook. My favorite musician is Bruno Mars.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
It is going well. How about yours?
It's going great! I'm getting ready to go to a concert with my kids.
Oh, that sounds like fun! Who are you going to see?
We're going to see Bruno Mars. He's one of my favorite musicians.
Oh, nice! I love Bruno Mars too. I've seen him in concert a few times.
That's awesome! I'm really excited to see him.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my kids and my pets. I also love to cook and bake.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love to cook and bake too.
That's great! We should do that together sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to meet you and your kids.
Okay, let's exchange numbers and we can make plans.
Sounds good. I'll text you soon.
